column1: Cognate with Karakhanid [script needed] ‎(siŋir, “muscle, sinew”), Old Uighur [script needed] ‎(siŋir, “muscle”), Azeri sinir ‎(“nerve”), Bashkir һеңер ‎(heñer, “sinew”), Chuvash шӑнӑр ‎(šănăr, “vein, tendon, sinew”), Kazakh сіңір ‎(siñir, “sinew”), Khakas сиир ‎(siir, “sinew”), Kyrgyz сиңир ‎(siñir, “sinew”), Tatar сеңер ‎(señer, “sinew”), Turkmen siňir ‎(“sinew”), Tuvan сиир ‎(sïïr, “sinew”), Uyghur سىڭىر ‎(singir, “sinew”), Uzbek singir ‎(“tendon”), Yakut иҥиир ‎(iŋiir, “sinew”).
